Пошив світшота за індивідуальними міркам: Tailoring a sweatshirt to individual measurements
Проєкт передбачає створення колекції одя: The project involves creating a clothing collection for people affected by war, with a focus on ensuring high quality and accessibility at reduced prices. The initiative will develop dedicated funding and partnerships with local manufacturers to support communities and improve their living conditions.The War Victims Clothing Project aims to provide support to those most in need during these difficult times. We plan to create a special clothing collection that meets the needs of people who have lost their homes and livelihoods.
Проєкт має на меті створення доступного: The project aims to create affordable and quality clothing for victims of war. As many people have been forced to leave their homes and lost their belongings, providing them with basic needs, such as clothing, is an urgent task.Our initiative seeks not only to provide physical support, but also to create an atmosphere of support and hope for survivors to help them feel part of society again.
Виробництво та якість.В основі проєкту л: Production and quality. The project is based on collaboration with local clothing and textile manufacturers, which will allow us to use the existing potential and resources of the community. We plan to develop a collection of basic clothing, including T-shirts, sweaters, jackets and pants, with an emphasis on simplicity, comfort and ease of wear.All products will be made from environmentally friendly materials, which will ensure their durability and safety for health.
Соціальні ініціативи.Крім безпосередньог: Social initiatives. In addition to the direct production of clothing, the project involves the involvement of volunteers and social workers who will help organize the sewing and distribution process. This will also be an opportunity for people to join an important cause, supporting each other in difficult times.We plan to hold sewing trainings for those who wish, which will allow not only to gain new skills, but also to involve the community in active participation in the project.
Для покриття витрат на матеріали та виро: To cover the costs of materials and production processes, a crowdfunding campaign will be launched to attract funding from caring citizens and organizations. We also plan to collaborate with charitable foundations and government agencies to obtain support and resources.It is also important to establish cooperation with local stores that can participate in the distribution of ready-made clothing among those in need.
Психологічна підтримка.Наш проєкт передб: Psychological support. Our project provides not only material but also psychological support to the victims. The initiative will organize events and meetings to discuss experiences and needs, which will help people share their stories and find support. This will contribute to the creation of a community where everyone can feel that their voice matters and they are not alone in their trials.
Отже, проєкт з пошиву одягу для потерпіл: So, the project to sew clothes for victims of war is an attempt to provide material and emotional support to people who have experienced hardship. Through the efforts of the community, local manufacturers and volunteers, we hope to create not only clothes, but also an environment in which victims can regain their strength, gain new opportunities and return to normal life.

Краудфандинг на Seed Flow дає людям змог: Crowdfunding on Seed Flow allows people to come together around ideas that matter to them and bring those ideas to life together. Whether you’re looking for the latest technology, supporting your favorite independent filmmaker, or helping a worthy cause, you can find something to inspire you on Seed Flow.Crowdfunding creates exciting opportunities for both backers and entrepreneurs, but there are some basic facts that all backers should know.
Етапи продукту надають бекерам уявлення: Product stages provide backers with insight into the development phase of technology and innovation campaigns, helping them make informed decisions before contributing.
Багато кампаній пропонують пільги як под: Many campaigns offer perks as a thank you to sponsors in exchange for varying amounts of contributions. Perks can be items, recognition, appreciation, services, events, or anything that doesn't violate our Terms of Service. Check out the list of perks on the right side of the campaign page. When you see a specific perk you're interested in on the campaign page, click on the perk itself . You'll select the perk to continue the donation verification process.
Кампанії проводяться окремими авторами к: Campaigns are run by individual campaign authors, not Seed Flow. As such, they are best placed to help answer any questions you may have about their project or the bonuses they offer! If you have any questions or concerns about a specific campaign, or the bonuses offered in a campaign, or the claims made in a campaign, we recommend that you contact the campaign author directly. If you have a Seed Flow account and participated in the campaign, you can post a comment on the campaign creator's page or send them a direct message.
Розвивайте свою ідею далі з цими досвідч: Take your idea further with these experienced companies recommended by campaigners and Seed Flow staff

Коли шукати експертної допомоги для крау: When to seek expert help for a crowdfunding campaign
Посібник із збільшення аудиторії вашої к: A guide to growing your campaign audience
Запуск краудфандингової кампанії на конк: Launching a crowdfunding campaign in a competitive market can seem daunting, but it’s also an opportunity to showcase what makes your project unique. With a thoughtful approach and a solid strategy, you can stand out, engage your audience, and succeed even in a crowded field. Here are some pro tips to help you shine:
Чим ваш проект відрізняється від інших н: What makes your project different from others in the market? Clearly defining your unique value is the first step to standing out.
Чому це важливо. Потенційним спонсорам п: Why it matters: Potential donors need a clear reason to choose your campaign over others.
Підкресліть проблему, яку вирішує ваш пр: Highlight the problem your product solves and why it’s important to your audience. Highlight any unique features, benefits, or innovations. Share your story—what inspired your project and why you’re passionate about it.
2. Створіть сильну присутність перед зап: 2. Create a strong presence before launching
Чудова кампанія починається ще до дня за: A great campaign starts before launch day. Use your pre-launch phase to build buzz and establish your presence.
Чому це важливо: серйозні зусилля перед: Why it matters: A solid pre-launch effort builds anticipation and ensures a ready audience at launch.
Створіть сторінку перед запуском, щоб зб: Create a pre-launch page to collect email addresses and gauge interest. Share teasers, behind-the-scenes content, and updates on social media. Engage with your network and encourage them to spread the word.
3. Зосередьтеся на чітких і переконливих: 3. Focus on clear and compelling messages
На переповненому ринку ясність є ключово: In a crowded marketplace, clarity is key. Your messaging should instantly communicate what your campaign is about and why it’s worth supporting.
Чому це важливо: люди, швидше за все, за: Why it matters: People are more likely to engage with a campaign that is easy to understand and emotionally resonant.
Використовуйте просту, привабливу мову,: Use simple, engaging language that highlights the benefits of your product. Focus on how your project improves the lives of your backers. Avoid jargon or overly technical terms that may confuse or alienate potential supporters.
У морі кампаній яскраві візуальні ефекти: In a sea of ​​campaigns, striking visuals can make yours stand out.
Чому це важливо? Високоякісні зображення: Why it’s important: High-quality images and videos attract attention and convey professionalism.
Використовуйте професійні фотографії та: Use professional photos and videos to showcase your product. Include a clear, engaging video presentation that highlights the features, benefits, and story of your product. Make sure your visuals are consistent with your brand and messaging.
Ваші бонуси є головним стимулом для спон: Your bonuses are the main incentive for sponsors, so make them attractive and valuable.
Чому це важливо: привабливі бонуси заохо: Why it matters: Attractive bonuses encourage contributions and create buzz around your campaign.
Пропонуйте різноманітні бонуси за різним: Offer a variety of bonuses at different price points to appeal to a wide audience. Use early bird bonuses to reward early backers and create urgency. Consider exclusive or limited-time bonuses to add a sense of exclusivity.
Краудфандинг — це не лише фінансування,: Crowdfunding is not just about funding, but also about creating a community of supporters who believe in your vision.
Чому це важливо: заангажовані спонсори з: Why it matters: Engaged backers are more likely to contribute, share your campaign, and become supporters of your project.
Швидко відповідайте на запитання та коме: Respond quickly to questions and comments from sponsors. Show appreciation by thanking sponsors in person or through campaign updates. Engage your audience with regular updates, milestones, and long-term goals.
Коли потенційні спонсори бачать, що інші: When potential donors see that others are supporting your campaign, they are more likely to join.
Чому це важливо: соціальний доказ створю: Why it matters: Social proof builds trust and momentum.
Виділіть перші внески та етапи на сторін: Highlight early contributions and milestones on your campaign page and social media. Share testimonials or quotes from early supporters. Encourage backers to share their excitement about your campaign with their networks.
Краудфандинг на переповненому ринку може: Crowdfunding in a crowded market can seem daunting, but it’s also an opportunity to rise above the competition. By focusing on your unique value, building strong connections, and crafting a campaign that resonates with your audience, you can succeed and bring your vision to life.
Пам’ятайте, кожна взаємодія з вашою ауди: Remember, every interaction with your audience is an opportunity to demonstrate your passion and commitment. Take the first step today and make your campaign unforgettable!
У дусі спільноти Indiegogo постійно прац: In the spirit of community, Indiegogo is constantly working to ensure that members of our community, those who could potentially join our community, and those who are simply curious have access to and can navigate the Indiegogo site.
Якщо у вас виникли труднощі з переглядом: If you have any difficulty viewing the content or navigating the site, please send an email to our team. We will be happy to assist you.
Загальний регламент захисту даних («GDPR: The General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) is a European Union data privacy law that applies to the 28 EU member states and 3 additional member states of the European Economic Area (EU and EEA collectively referred to as the “EEA”). The GDPR gives individuals certain rights in relation to their personal data, including the right to access, rectify, erase and restrict the processing of their data.GDPR requests can be submitted by users who are residents of the EEA.
Seed Flow дуже серйозно ставиться до пра: Seed Flow takes intellectual property (“IP”) rights very seriously. This article describes how Seed Flow handles intellectual property disputes regarding content on our platform. Important note: This article is not intended to provide legal advice for any purpose and should not be construed as legal advice.We recommend that you consult with a lawyer before sending us any legal correspondence, including a demand letter or takedown request, or if you have any questions regarding intellectual property rights.
Авторське право захищає результати інтел: Copyright protects the results of intellectual activity in literature, art, music, cinema, and other fields. In Ukraine, it is regulated by the Law «On Copyright and Related Rights», and internationally by the Berne Convention.
· Виникає автоматично після створення тв: · Occurs automatically after the creation of the work, without the need for registration.
· Автор має виключне право на використан: · The author has the exclusive right to use the work, its distribution and commercialization.
· Термін дії: 70 років після смерті авто: · Validity period: 70 years after the author's death.
Торгова марка (бренд) – це позначення, я: A trademark (brand) is a designation that distinguishes the goods and services of one company from another. In Ukraine, Ukrpatent is responsible for registering trademarks, and internationally, the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) and the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO).
· The application is submitted to Ukrpatent.
· Правоохоронний термін – 10 років із мо: · The legal term is 10 years with the possibility of extension.
· Діє принцип «перший зареєстрований – п: · The principle of «first registered - first owner» applies.
Патент захищає винаходи,корисні моделі т: A patent protects inventions, utility models, and industrial designs. It grants the owner the exclusive right to use a technological solution.
· Винахід - технічне рішення, що має нов: · An invention is a technical solution that is novel and involves an inventive step.
· Корисна модель - спрощена форма винахо: · Utility model - a simplified form of the invention
1. Подання заявки до Укрпатенту: 1. Submission of an application to Ukrpatent
2. Експертиза на відповідність критеріям: 2. Examination for compliance with novelty criteria.
4. Охоронний термін: 20 років для винахо: 4. Protection term: 20 years for an invention, 10 years for a utility model.
Захист інтелектуальної власності – важли: Intellectual property protection is an important element of the legal system, providing creators, inventors and businesses with mechanisms to monetize and protect their ideas. Registering copyrights, trademarks and patents helps prevent illegal use and promotes innovation.

Чашка з блюдцем від стартапу кафе «Чашка: The cup and saucer from the startup cafe «Cup of Coffee» is an elegant accessory for true coffee lovers. Made of high-quality porcelain, it has a pleasant texture and elegant shape, which gives each sip a special charm. The design of the cup is decorated with the cafe logo, emphasizing your belonging to the community of coffee lovers. The set is complemented by a stylish saucer, which is perfect for small snacks or sweets. By purchasing this product, you not only get a stylish accessory, but also support the development of a young cafe that strives to give you the best coffee experience.
Урбаністичне кафе «Чашка кави» – це місц: Urban cafe «Cup of Coffee» is a place where modernity meets tradition, creating a unique atmosphere for visitors. Located in the heart of the city, the cafe attracts attention not only with delicious coffee, but also with a stylish interior with elements of industrial design.The menu offers a variety of coffee drinks, from classic espresso to signature coffee-based cocktails that will surprise even the most demanding gourmets. In addition, the cafe often hosts coffee-making workshops and other cultural events that unite the local community.
«Чашка кави» підтримує локальних виробни: «Cup of Coffee» supports local producers, so most of the ingredients used in drinks and desserts come from the region. The cafe offers comfortable areas for work and relaxation, making it a popular place for freelancers and students. Leave all your worries behind and enjoy the cozy atmosphere and friendly service. And for those who want to take a piece of «Cup of Coffee» home, exclusive merchandise is offered, including cups with saucers and stylish eco-bags. Visit us to experience a true passion for coffee combined with urban style!
This product is Seed Flow platform merchandise.
Худі Seed Flow вирізняється стильним диз: The Seed Flow Hoodie features a stylish design and comfortable fit, making it the perfect choice for everyday wear. Made from high-quality materials, it has a soft texture, providing warmth and comfort. The Seed Flow logo on the front emphasizes belonging to the community of entrepreneurs and innovators. This hoodie is available in a variety of colors, allowing everyone to find their unique style.Thanks to its versatile design, it can be combined with both jeans and sweatpants. It is not just clothing, but a symbol of support for startups and creativity, which makes it popular among young and active people.

· Прозорість: Seed Flow забезпечує прозо: · Transparency: Seed Flow ensures transparency in the funding process, allowing investors to monitor the development of projects.
· Комунікація з інвесторами: Платформа с: · Communication with investors: The platform creates conditions for feedback between entrepreneurs and investors, which contributes to the development of relationships.

2. Файли cookie продуктивності: Ці файли: 2. Performance cookies: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so that we can measure and improve the performance of our site.
3. Файли cookie функціональності: Ці фай: 3. Functionality cookies: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language or region) to improve your user experience.
4. Файли cookie реклами: Ці файли cookie: 4. Advertising cookies: These cookies may be used to make advertising more relevant and targeted to you. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an ad and help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

• Спілкування з вами щодо ваших проектів: • Communicating with you about your projects, updates, and news.
Ми зберігаємо вашу інформацію лише стіль: We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes set out in this policy or to comply with legal requirements.
Ми не передаємо вашу особисту інформацію: We do not share your personal information with third parties unless it is necessary to fulfill our obligation (for example, to process payments) or if required by law.
Ми вживаємо відповідні технічні та орган: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, accidental loss or destruction.
• Запитувати доступ до своїх персональни: • Request access to your personal data.
• Вимагати виправлення невірних або непо: • Request correction of incorrect or incomplete data.
• Запитувати видалення своїх персональни: • Request deletion of your personal data.
• Відкликати згоду на обробку даних у бу: • Withdraw consent to data processing at any time.
Ми можемо періодично оновлювати цю Політ: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated date.
Якщо у вас є запитання або коментарі щод: If you have any questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Цей документ регулює правові відносини м: This document regulates the legal relations between users (project authors, donors) and the administration of the SeedFlow crowdfunding platform. Using the Platform implies automatic consent of users to the terms of this document. The Platform administration strives to create a safe and transparent environment for the implementation of creative, social and commercial initiatives.
Користувачі несуть відповідальність за д: Users are responsible for compliance with all applicable regulations governing financial operations and electronic transactions in Ukraine. The Platform operates in accordance with the Law of Ukraine “On Electronic Commerce” [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/675-19], the Law of Ukraine “On Financial Services and Financial Companies” [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/2664-14] and other regulations governing the field of electronic finance and payment transactions.
2. Умови використання Платформи: 2. Terms of Use of the Platform
Автори проектів зобов’язані надавати точ: Project authors are obliged to provide accurate, up-to-date and reliable information about their initiatives in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Information» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/2657-12].
Використання зібраних коштів повинно від: The use of collected funds must correspond exclusively to the stated purposes, which is controlled by the Platform administration and relevant regulatory authorities.
Усі зміни у фінансуванні або цільовому в: All changes in funding or targeted use of funds must be approved by the Platform administration and transparently communicated to donors.
Автори зобов’язані дотримуватися принцип: The authors are obliged to adhere to the principles of transparency, as well as maintain documentation of all project costs in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Accounting and Financial Reporting» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/996-14].
Благодійники надають кошти добровільно,: Benefactors provide funds voluntarily, agreeing that contributions are voluntary and do not guarantee the receipt of any rewards or services.
Всі фінансові операції благодійників зді: All financial transactions of philanthropists are carried out in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Charitable Activities and Charitable Organizations» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/5073-17].
Благодійники мають право отримати деталь: Benefactors have the right to receive a detailed report on the use of funds, which is provided by the project authors in the format established by the Platform administration.
Благодійники мають право вимагати поверн: Benefactors have the right to demand a refund in the event of non-implementation of the project or detection of fraudulent actions, which is subject to verification in accordance with the norms of the Civil Code of Ukraine [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/435-15].
Адміністрація залишає за собою право пер: The administration reserves the right to check projects for compliance with legislation and the Platform's internal policies.
У разі виявлення порушень або недотриман: If violations or failure to comply with the stated obligations are detected, the administration may block the project, terminate funding and contact the competent authorities in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Consumer Rights Protection» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/1023-12].
Усі фінансові транзакції здійснюються ві: All financial transactions are carried out in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Payment Services» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/1591-IX] and the Law of Ukraine «On Financial Services and Financial Companies» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/2664-14].
Платформа співпрацює виключно з ліцензов: The platform cooperates exclusively with licensed financial institutions and payment systems that comply with the requirements of Ukrainian legislation.
Платформа має право утримувати комісію з: The platform has the right to charge a commission for providing payment processing services and administrative support for projects in accordance with the Legislation of Ukraine on E-Commerce.
Відсоток комісії та умови її застосуванн: The commission percentage and the terms of its application are specified in the relevant agreements between the project authors and the Platform administration.
У разі скасування проекту або виявлення: In the event of project cancellation or fraud detection, funds may be returned to donors in accordance with the Civil Code of Ukraine.
Для повернення коштів благодійники повин: To return funds, benefactors must submit a request to the administration, which will verify the request's compliance with the established rules of the Platform.
Усі персональні дані користувачів обробл: All personal data of users is processed in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Personal Data Protection» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/2297-17].
Всі фінансові операції проходять багатор: All financial transactions undergo multi-level verification and encryption in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Electronic Document Management» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/851-15].
Користувачі несуть повну відповідальніст: Users are fully responsible for the information provided in accordance with the Criminal Code of Ukraine [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/2341-14].
Адміністрація Платформи не несе відповід: The Platform Administration is not responsible for the implementation of projects, but has the right to take measures against unscrupulous authors.
Адміністрація залишає за собою право вно: The administration reserves the right to make changes to this document in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Electronic Communications» [https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/3014-20].
Будь-які зміни набувають чинності через: Any changes come into effect 10 days after official publication on the Platform website.
Використання Платформи після внесення зм: Using the Platform after the changes are made means automatic consent of users to the new terms.
